content:
[Ohio Senate 2024 | Columbus Metro (Franklin County - Upper Arlington/Dublin) | P1: F, 42, Healthcare executive, Upper Arlington, Biden 2020, moderate Democrat]
Q: What would it take for Democrats to be competitive statewide?
"Address the opioid crisis, the despair. Not just policy but recognition."
